name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Task Boost: An Easy-to-Use Pomodoro Timer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set time-driven goals and block specific sites to reduce distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspired by the world-renowned "Pomodoro" productivity technique, Task Boost was built to help you accomplish your daily goals. It features a timer, to-do list, and website blocker to reduce distractions and keep you focused.
